maxairesources.customer360.utility.parse_arguments()[source]

Function to parse the arguments

maxairesources.customer360.utility.prepare_agg_arguments(config)[source]

Function to perpare the arguments for aggregations using signals provided in the json

Parameters:

config (dict) : dictionary which holds information singnals defination

Returns:

list: arguments_without_events, list: arguments_with_events

Sample Input:
{
“signals”: [
{

“groupby_col”: “customer_id”, “agg_col”: “mkt_channel_name”, “event_col”: “mkt_channel_name”, “operation”: 6, “time_period”: 7, “type”: “int”, “transaction”: true

}, {

“groupby_col”: “customer_id”, “agg_col”: “offer_id”, “event_col”: “”, “operation”: 7, “time_period”: 7, “type”: “int”, “transaction”: true

}, {

“groupby_col”: “customer_id”, “agg_col”: “offer_id”, “event_col”: “”, “operation”: 7, “time_period”: 14, “type”: “int”, “transaction”: true

}

]

}

Output:
[
{

“agg_col”: “offer_id”, “operation”: 7, “time_period”: 7, “time_column”: “time_difference”, “event_column”: “”, “data_type”: “int”, “updated_name”: “i_count_distinct_offer_id_7_days”, “filter”: null

}, {

“agg_col”: “offer_id”, “operation”: 7, “time_period”: 7, “time_column”: “last_7_transactions”, “event_column”: “”, “data_type”: “int”, “updated_name”: “i_count_distinct_offer_id_last_7_transactions”, “filter”: null

}, {

“agg_col”: “offer_id”, “operation”: 7, “time_period”: 14, “time_column”: “time_difference”, “event_column”: “”, “data_type”: “int”, “updated_name”: “i_count_distinct_offer_id_14_days”, “filter”: null

}, {

“agg_col”: “offer_id”, “operation”: 7, “time_period”: 14, “time_column”: “last_14_transactions”, “event_column”: “”, “data_type”: “int”, “updated_name”: “i_count_distinct_offer_id_last_14_transactions”, “filter”: null

}

], [

{

“agg_col”: “mkt_channel_name”, “operation”: 6, “time_period”: 7, “time_column”: “time_difference”, “event_column”: “mkt_channel_name”, “data_type”: “int”, “updated_name”: “i_count_mkt_channel_name_7_days”, “filter”: “all”

}, {

“agg_col”: “mkt_channel_name”, “operation”: 6, “time_period”: 7, “time_column”: “last_7_transactions”, “event_column”: “mkt_channel_name”, “data_type”: “int”, “updated_name”: “i_count_mkt_channel_name_last_7_transactions”, “filter”: “all”

}

]
